description: This file defines an Angular component called MySubscriptionsComponent that displays and manages a user's subscriptions, including listing, sorting, and refreshing subscription data, with references to subscription and folio services.

classes.name: MySubscriptionsComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying and managing user subscriptions listing, sorting, and refresh functionality.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook to load subscriptions when component initializes.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting of the subscription list based on selected key.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches user's subscriptions and associated folio data, then updates the component's rows.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the subscription rows based on the current sort key.

ctags.name: k
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof (Subscription & { price?: number; folioTitle?: string });$/
